name: pre-historic-vr
description: Complete VR Cultural Heritage System for Prehistoric Liberia

scripts.backend: cd backend && npm install && node server.js
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.database:setup: cd database && npm install && npm run setup

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
